songs.title: Everyone But You
songs.lyric:
V1

Rumor has it you found someone

They say you disappear when your phone lights up

And ya don’t hang out with your friends as much

As you used to

 

You work through lunch and you don’t take breaks, just to

Cut out early for dinner dates

Yeah it’s obvious that’s something’s changed

About you

 

CH

It’s the talk, talk, talk, talk, talk of the town

I’m the first to know and the last to find out

I’m the only one

But I hear it from everyone

You know I know what you’re talking about

But you won’t say it out loud

I know I’m the only one

But I hear it from everyone but you

 

V2

You brought me home to your mama’s house

I wondered what the fuss was all about

They say thatcha never bring girls around

I was the first one

 

Yeah, I can tell that you’re feeling it

Cuz you tell me with every soft, slow kiss

But I wanna hear it come off your lips

Just say I love ya, I love ya, I love ya…

 

BR

Yeah, it’s easier said than done

So say I love ya, I love ya

 

CH

songs.title: Take It to the Grave
songs.fileName: Take It to the Grave MP3 Laura Vance.mp3
songs.lyric:
V1

I tell your mother I’m doing fine

She sends me money from time to time

Since you been gone

I’ve been living with my sin

Small town princess with no prince

 

PRE

You left me your last name

A baby on the way

No sign that you ever left

No sign that you’re coming back

 

CH

Every rose has a thorn

Every angel has a horn

You keep my secret, I’ll keep yours safe

Take it to the grave

 

V2

It took a year to just start breathing

I don’t think folks ever stop talking

Some think it’s my fault, and I drove you away

Others think you lost it

I think you had it coming

 

PRE

I see you in my dreams

Like a ghost that’s haunting

But like the baby, I fall back to sleep

Cuz you can’t touch me

 

CH

 

V3

I planted flowers in the garden

You always had a thing for roses

Long stem payment for forgiveness

Now we’re even…shhhhh

You’re my little secret

In the garden

songs.title: Wish I Could Change
songs.fileName: Wish I Could Change MP3 Laura Vance.mp3
songs.lyric:
V1

Sometimes I try to hide

Because I’m so afraid

Of feeling alive

The scars it could make

 

PRE

Wish I could change

Wish I could change

 

V2

You loved me inside out; up and down; You’ve seen me up and down

When lovers/other went/ran away; And loved me anyway; Tears fall down my face

When I finally come around

You’re tired of the chase

 

PRE

Wish I could change

Wish I could change

Wish I could change

 

CH

The past, your mind, I’m sorry, goodbye

 

INSTRUMENTAL

 

CH

PRE

 

V3

Strange, how we began

I was so afraid

And now, here at the end

I have scars anyway

songs.title: When I Fall
songs.lyric:
V1

Never say never

I thought forever

Wasn’t true

Then you

Broke thru the ice

Took all the time

I needed to

Fall for you

 

CH

I-ay-ay’ll

Never ask why-ay-ay

I was so slow to fall

Scared to fly

In to

That deep sea of You-ooo-ooo

Ready with open arms

To catch me when I fall

 

V2

If love was a boat

I was looking for holes

Trying to sink it

Cuz I’m always thinking; Maybe I’m stupid

How can it be

That you chose me

Or am I dreaming

If this is the real thing

 

CH

 

BR

So as I take that leap of faith

I will be brave

That’s what love takes

 

CH

songs.title: Your Side Of The Bed
songs.fileName: Your Side Of The Bed (Laura Vance).mp3
songs.lyric:
V1

The sun is high

I’m feeling low

Don’t know whether I should come

Or whether I should go…no

So I don’t

 

You got away

I watched you leave

But the sun keeps coming up

Like you it’s over me…cuz I see

 

CH

Your cars gone

So is your toothbrush

Your favorite coffee cup

My favorite t-shirt

The closets just full of hangers

I’ll never use up

Now that you’re gone           

There’s a scar that marks the hole inside of my chest

I’m as empty as your side of the bed

 

V2

My eyes are dry

I try to sleep

Hoping when I wake up

You’ll be there right beside me…

It was a dream

 

CH

 

BR

The truth hurts

Cuz it’s too late to tell

Anyone but myself

What I put you through

And I’m sorry

I never told you so

The one thing you should know

How much I need you

 

CH
